overview: This Myth Makers combines two interviews with Sarah Sutton; one filmed at Harrisonâ€™s Rocks, the main location for Castrovalva; the second recorded in a London studio eight years later and featuring some familiar monsters.  Sarah chats to Nicholas Briggs about working with Tom Baker, Peter Davison, Janet Fielding and Matthew Waterhouse. There are also many behind-the-scenes stories about working on Doctor Who.
title: Myth Makers 9: Sarah Sutton
